decks.notes: The main concept of this UR aggro deck is to maintain card advantage and play aggressively by utilizing cards like Dreadhorde Arcanist and Stormchaser's Talent to deal damage quickly. The deck also includes cards like Opt and Sleight of Hand to filter through the deck and find key pieces. Cards like Fiery Impulse and Torch the Tower provide removal options, while Vivi Ornitier and Cori-Steel Cutter offer additional threats. This deck aims to control the board and pressure the opponent, ultimately leading to a fast-paced victory.
